verses.verse: At <S%G1722><s%> That <S%G1565><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Time <S%G2540><s%> Went <S%G4198><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> On The <S%G3588><s%> Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4702><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Corn Fields; <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3101><s%> And His Disciples <S%G846><s%> Were Hungry, <S%G3983><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Began <S%G756><s%> To Pluck The <S%G5089><s%> Ears <S%G4719><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Eat. <S%G2068><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> Having Seen <S%G1492><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> Thy Disciples <S%G4675><s%> Are Doing <S%G4160><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3756><s%> It Is Not Lawful <S%G1832><s%> To Do <S%G4160><s%> On <S%G1722><s%> Sabbath. <S%G4521><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Ye Have Read <S%G314><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Did <S%G4160><s%>, David, <S%G1138><s%> When <S%G3753><s%> He Hungered <S%G3983><s%> Himself <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Him? <S%G846><s%>

How <S%G4459><s%> He Entered <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3624><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Loaves <S%G740><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Presentation <S%G4286><s%> He Ate, <S%G5315><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Lawful <S%G1832><s%> It Was <S%G2258><s%> For Him <S%G846><s%> To Eat, <S%G5315><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> For Those <S%G3588><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> <S%G846><s%> Him, <S%G1487><s%> But <S%G3361><s%> For The <S%G3588><s%> Priests <S%G2409><s%> Only? <S%G3441><s%>

Or <S%G2228><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Have Ye Not Read <S%G314><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Law, <S%G3551><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> On The <S%G3588><s%> Sabbaths <S%G4521><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Priests <S%G2409><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Temple <S%G2411><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sabbath <S%G4521><s%> Profane, <S%G953><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Guiltless <S%G338><s%> Are? <S%G1526><s%>
<S%G3004><s%> But I Say <S%G1161><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Than The Temple <S%G2411><s%> A Greater <S%G3187><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Here. <S%G5602><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> Ye Had Known <S%G1097><s%> What <S%G5101><s%>, Is, <S%G2076><s%> Mercy <S%G1656><s%> I Desire <S%G2309><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%>, Sacrifice, <S%G2378><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Not <S%G302><s%> Ye Had Condemned <S%G2613><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Guiltless. <S%G338><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Having Departed <S%G3327><s%> Thence, <S%G1564><s%> He Went <S%G2064><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4864><s%> Their Synagogue. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> There Was <S%G2258><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Hand <S%G5495><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%>, Withered. <S%G3584><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> They Asked <S%G1905><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3004><s%> Saying, <S%G1487><s%> Is It Lawful <S%G1832><s%> On The <S%G3588><s%> Sabbaths <S%G4521><s%> To Heal? <S%G2323><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> They Might Accuse <S%G2723><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%>, To Them, <S%G846><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> Shall There Be <S%G2071><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> Man, <S%G444><s%> Who <S%G3739><s%> Shall Have <S%G2192><s%> Sheep <S%G4263><s%> One, <S%G1520><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Fall <S%G1706><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> On The <S%G3588><s%> Sabbaths <S%G4521><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> A Pit, <S%G999><s%> Will Not <S%G3780><s%> Lay Hold Of <S%G2902><s%> It <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> ; Will Raise It Up? <S%G1453><s%>

How Much <S%G4214><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> Is Better <S%G1308><s%> A Man <S%G444><s%> Than A Sheep? <S%G4263><s%> So That <S%G5620><s%> It Is Lawful <S%G1832><s%> <S%G3588><s%> On The Sabbaths <S%G4521><s%> Well <S%G2573><s%> To Do. <S%G4160><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> He Says <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To The Man, <S%G444><s%> Stretch Out <S%G1614><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Hand <S%G5495><s%> Thy. <S%G4675><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Stretched It Out, <S%G1614><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> It Was Restored <S%G600><s%> Sound <S%G5199><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Other. <S%G243><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> A Council <S%G4824><s%> Held <S%G2983><s%> ' Against <S%G2596><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Having Gone Out <S%G1831><s%> How <S%G3704><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> They Might Destroy. <S%G622><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Having Known <S%G1097><s%> Withdrew <S%G402><s%> Thence, <S%G1564><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Followed <S%G190><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> Great, <S%G4183><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Healed <S%G2323><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> All, <S%G3956><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Strictly Charged <S%G2008><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Publicly Known <S%G5318><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> They Should Make. <S%G4160><s%>

So That <S%G3704><s%> Might Be Fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Was Spoken <S%G4483><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophet, <S%G4396><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%>

Behold <S%G2400><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3816><s%> My Servant <S%G3450><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> I Have Chosen, <S%G140><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G27><s%> My Beloved <S%G3450><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> Has Found Delight <S%G2106><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5590><s%> My Soul. <S%G3450><s%> I Will Put <S%G5087><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4151><s%> My Spirit <S%G3450><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%>, Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Judgment <S%G2920><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Nations <S%G1484><s%> He Shall Declare. <S%G518><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> He Shall Not Strive <S%G2051><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> Cry Out, <S%G2905><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> Shall Hear <S%G191><s%> Any One <S%G5100><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Streets <S%G4113><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5456><s%> His Voice. <S%G846><s%>

A Reed <S%G2563><s%> Bruised <S%G4937><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Shall Not Break, <S%G2608><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Flax <S%G3043><s%> Smoking <S%G5188><s%> <S%G3756><s%> He Shall Not Quench, <S%G4570><s%> <S%G2193><s%> Until <S%G302><s%> He Bring Forth <S%G1544><s%> Unto <S%G1519><s%> Victory <S%G3534><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Judgment. <S%G2920><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> His Name The <S%G846><s%> Nations <S%G1484><s%> Shall Hope. <S%G1679><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Was Brought <S%G4374><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> One Possessed By A Demon, <S%G1139><s%> Blind <S%G5185><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Dumb, <S%G2974><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He Healed <S%G2323><s%>, Him, <S%G846><s%> So That <S%G5620><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Blind <S%G5185><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Dumb <S%G2974><s%> Both <S%G2532><s%> Spake <S%G2980><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Saw. <S%G991><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Were Amazed <S%G1839><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3004><s%> Said, <S%G3385><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> Of David? <S%G1138><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Pharisees <S%G5330><s%> Having Heard <S%G191><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> This Man <S%G3778><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Casts Not Out <S%G1544><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Demons <S%G1140><s%> <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Beelzebub <S%G954><s%> Prince <S%G758><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Demons. <S%G1140><s%>

<S%G1492><s%> But Knowing <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1761><s%> Their Thoughts <S%G846><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> Divided <S%G3307><s%> ' Against <S%G2596><s%> Itself <S%G1438><s%> Is Brought To Desolation, <S%G2049><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> City <S%G4172><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> House <S%G3614><s%> Divided <S%G3307><s%> ' Against <S%G2596><s%> Itself <S%G1438><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Will Not Stand. <S%G2476><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> Casts Out, <S%G1544><s%> ' Against <S%G1909><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> He Was Divided. <S%G3307><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Then <S%G3767><s%> Will Stand <S%G2476><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G932><s%> His Kingdom? <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> I 1473 P-1NS By 1722 PREP Beelzebub 954 N-PRI Cast Out 1544 V-PAI-1S The 3588 T-APN Demons, 1140 N-APN 3588 T-NPM 5207 N-NPM Your Sons 5216 P-2GP By 1722 PREP Whom 5101 I-DSM Do They Cast Out? 1544 V-PAI-3P On Account Of 1223 PREP This 5124 D-ASN They 846 P-NPM Of You 5216 P-2GP Shall Be 2071 V-FXI-3P Judges. 2923 N-NPM

<S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> I 1473 P-1NS By The 1722 PREP Spirit 4151 N-DSN Of God 2316 N-GSM Cast Out 1544 V-PAI-1S The 3588 T-APN Demons, 1140 N-APN Then 686 PRT Has Come 5348 V-AAI-3S ' Upon 1909 PREP You 5209 P-2AP The 3588 T-NSF Kingdom 932 N-NSF 3588 T-GSM Of God. 2316 N-GSM

Or <S%G2228><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Is Able <S%G1410><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> To Enter <S%G1525><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House <S%G3614><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Strong Man <S%G2478><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Goods <S%G4632><s%> His <S%G846><s%>, To Plunder, <S%G1283><s%> <S%G1437><s%> Unless <S%G3361><s%> First <S%G4412><s%> He Bind <S%G1210><s%> The <S%G3588><s%>, Strong Man? <S%G2478><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Then <S%G5119><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3614><s%> His House <S%G846><s%> He Will Plunder. <S%G1283><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> He Who <S%G3361><s%> Is Not <S%G5607><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> ' Against <S%G2596><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> Is; <S%G2076><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> He Who <S%G3361><s%> Gathers Not <S%G4863><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> Scatters. <S%G4650><s%>

Because Of <S%G1223><s%> This <S%G5124><s%> I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Sin <S%G266><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Blasphemy <S%G988><s%> Shall Be Forgiven <S%G863><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Men, <S%G444><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Concerning The Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Blasphemy <S%G988><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Shall Not Be Forgiven <S%G863><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Men. <S%G444><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Whoever <S%G302><s%> Speaks <S%G2036><s%> A Word <S%G3056><s%> Against <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man, <S%G444><s%> It Shall Be Forgiven <S%G863><s%> Him; <S%G846><s%> <S%G3739><s%> ' <S%G1161><s%> But Whoever <S%G302><s%> Speaks <S%G2036><s%> Against <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy, <S%G40><s%> <S%G3756><s%> It Shall Not Be Forgiven <S%G863><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Neither <S%G3777><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> This <S%G5129><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Age <S%G165><s%> Nor <S%G3777><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Coming One. <S%G3195><s%>

Either <S%G2228><s%> Make <S%G4160><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tree <S%G1186><s%> Good <S%G2570><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fruit <S%G2590><s%> Its <S%G846><s%> Good, <S%G2570><s%> Or <S%G2228><s%> Make <S%G4160><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tree <S%G1186><s%> Corrupt <S%G4550><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Fruit <S%G2590><s%> Its <S%G846><s%> Corrupt : <S%G4550><s%> <S%G1537><s%> For From <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Fruit <S%G2590><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Tree <S%G1186><s%> Is Known. <S%G1097><s%>

Offspring <S%G1081><s%> Of Vipers, <S%G2191><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Are Ye Able <S%G1410><s%> Good Things <S%G18><s%> To Speak, <S%G2980><s%> Wicked <S%G4190><s%> Being? <S%G5607><s%> <S%G1537><s%> For Out Of <S%G1063><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Abundance <S%G4051><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heart <S%G2588><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mouth <S%G4750><s%> Speaks. <S%G2980><s%>

The <S%G3588><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> Treasure <S%G2344><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Heart <S%G2588><s%> Puts Forth <S%G1544><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Good Things; <S%G18><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wicked <S%G4190><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> Out Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wicked <S%G4190><s%> Treasure <S%G2344><s%> Puts Forth <S%G1544><s%> Wicked Things. <S%G4190><s%>

<S%G3004><s%> But I Say <S%G1161><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Word <S%G4487><s%> Idle <S%G692><s%> <S%G3739><s%> Whatsoever <S%G1437><s%> May Speak <S%G2980><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Men, <S%G444><s%> They Shall Render <S%G591><s%> Of <S%G4012><s%> It <S%G846><s%> An Account <S%G3056><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Day <S%G2250><s%> Of Judgment. <S%G2920><s%>

By <S%G1537><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3056><s%> Thy Words <S%G4675><s%> Thou Shalt Be Justified, <S%G1344><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> By <S%G1537><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3056><s%> Thy Words <S%G4675><s%> Thou Shalt Be Condemned. <S%G2613><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Answered <S%G611><s%> Some <S%G5100><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Pharisees, <S%G5330><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Teacher, <S%G1320><s%> We Wish <S%G2309><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Thee <S%G4675><s%> A Sign <S%G4592><s%> To See. <S%G1492><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> A Generation <S%G1074><s%> Wicked <S%G4190><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Adulterous <S%G3428><s%> A Sign <S%G4592><s%> Seeks For, <S%G1934><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Sign <S%G4592><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Shall Not Be Given <S%G1325><s%> To It, <S%G846><s%> <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sign <S%G4592><s%> Of Jonah <S%G2495><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophet. <S%G4396><s%>

<S%G5618><s%> For Even As <S%G1063><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> Jonah <S%G2495><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Belly <S%G2836><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Great Fish <S%G2785><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> Nights, <S%G3571><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heart <S%G2588><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> Days <S%G2250><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> Nights. <S%G3571><s%>
